description: Maki is a fashion designer. She is a regular customer at http://anidb.net/ch14624 [Osono]`s bakery and becomes http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki]`s first customer: She wants a birthday present for her nephew http://anidb.net/ch40153 [Ketto] to be delivered (a birdcage with a black cat doll that looks quite similar to http://anidb.net/ch13883 [Jiji]).
name: Maki (Designer)
